result.reason: The user wants to use arbitrary custom resolutions (defined by width/height) for RDP sessions and have the content smart-sized to fit the window, as currently only a predefined list of resolutions is supported.
result.approach: Add a 'Custom' option to the RDPResolutions enum and corresponding 'ResolutionWidth' and 'ResolutionHeight' properties to ConnectionInfo. Update RdpProtocol to use these custom dimensions when 'Custom' resolution is selected, ensuring SmartSizing is enabled.
